key.name: name
key.description: A fish without a name is a pretty dull fish. Bring your fish to life by naming him.

key.name: image
key.description: This key specifies the filename of the pixmap which will be used for the animation displayed in the fish applet relative to the pixmap directory.

key.name: command
key.description: This key specifies the command that will be tried to execute when the fish is clicked.

key.name: speed
key.description: This key specifies the number of seconds each frame will be displayed.

key.name: rotate
key.description: If true, the fish's animation will be displayed rotated on vertical panels.
